TokenSafe.unlock() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a7fe56109bacbcc525142aede71ab5bf8934cf2_TokenSafe.sol#85-112) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now > firstTimeLine) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a7fe56109bacbcc525142aede71ab5bf8934cf2_TokenSafe.sol#86)
	- now >= firstTimeLine (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a7fe56109bacbcc525142aede71ab5bf8934cf2_TokenSafe.sol#89)
	- now >= secondTimeLine (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a7fe56109bacbcc525142aede71ab5bf8934cf2_TokenSafe.sol#92)
	- now >= thirdTimeLine (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a7fe56109bacbcc525142aede71ab5bf8934cf2_TokenSafe.sol#95)
